design_philosophy.aesthetic: Clean, uncluttered, inspired by natural forms and light. Focus on tranquility, introspection, and gentle guidance.

primary.name: Serene Sky
primary.description: A soft, calming blue representing clarity and potential.

secondary.name: Earthy Mist
secondary.description: A light, warm off-white evoking natural light and openness.

accent.name: Forest Canopy
accent.description: A muted, deep teal for grounding elements and calls to action.

neutral.name: Stone Grey
neutral.description: A soft grey for secondary text and dividers, providing subtle contrast.

text.name: Deep Forest
text.description: A rich, dark blue-green for primary text, ensuring readability.

headings.description: A serif font that conveys wisdom and thoughtful consideration.

body.description: A clean, highly readable sans-serif for body text, ensuring clarity and accessibility.

accent.description: Italicized sans-serif for emphasis and reflective notes.

iconography.description: Icons will be simple and intuitive, evoking natural elements or gentle guidance. They will be used sparingly to enhance understanding without clutter.

design_principles: Clarity & Simplicity: Every element should serve a purpose, reducing cognitive load.
Mindful Interaction: Interactions should feel intuitive, calm, and encouraging.
Visual Balance: Use of whitespace, natural curves, and balanced layouts to create a harmonious experience.
Accessibility First: Adherence to WCAG 2.1 AA standards for color contrast, font sizes, and navigation.
Inspirational & Reflective: Design elements should prompt introspection and a sense of progress.

core_modules.name: Vision & Values Hub
core_modules.description: Facilitates TAS-001: Define Vision and Values. Users can journal, select values, and articulate their aspirations. Design: serene, open space with journaling prompts and interactive value selection tools.

core_modules.name: Self-Assessment & Insight
core_modules.description: Supports TAS-002: Assess Current State and TAS-003: Identify and Prioritize Development Areas. Features guided assessments, SWOT analysis tools, and reflection prompts. Design: calm, structured layout with clear progress indicators.

core_modules.name: Action Planning & Guidance
core_modules.description: Enables TAS-004: Formulate Action Plan. Users create SMART goals, break them down into actionable steps, and set timelines. Design: intuitive plan builder with visual progress tracking.

core_modules.name: Growth & Learning
core_modules.description: Supports TAS-005: Acquire Knowledge and Skills. Integrates resources, practice modules, and skill-building exercises. Design: clean, organized library of learning materials and practice spaces.

core_modules.name: Execution & Habit Tracking
core_modules.description: Facilitates TAS-006: Execute Actions and TAS-007: Monitor Progress. Daily check-ins, habit trackers, and task completion logs. Design: minimalist dashboard with clear daily focus and immediate feedback.

core_modules.name: Reflection & Iteration
core_modules.description: Supports TAS-008: Adjust, Adapt, and Iterate. Regular review prompts, feedback mechanisms, and options to modify plans. Design: dedicated reflection spaces with prompts for adaptation.

core_modules.name: Integration & Mastery
core_modules.description: Addresses TAS-009: Integrate Learnings and Solidify Growth. Celebrates milestones, showcases accumulated growth, and encourages the internalization of new states. Design: celebratory, reflective space that visualizes the journey and integrated self.

user_flows.name: Onboarding & Vision Setting
steps: Welcome screen (Earthy Mist background, Serene Sky accent)
user_flows.description: Guides new users through defining their core vision and values, setting the foundation for their journey.

user_flows.name: Personal Growth Cycle
steps: Loop back to Self-Assessment or continue growth
user_flows.description: The core cyclical process of self-improvement, from assessment to integration and iteration.

user_flows.name: Daily Engagement Flow
steps: Dashboard: Overview of daily tasks, habit status, and progress highlights.
Focus on one key task or habit for the day.
Check-in for task completion or habit adherence.
user_flows.description: A streamlined flow for daily interaction, focusing on consistent action and monitoring.

logo_concept.name: Ascent Bloom
logo_concept.description: A minimalist icon combining an upward-pointing arrow (representing ascent and progress) with a gently unfurling leaf or petal (representing natural growth and unfolding potential). The lines will be clean and organic, using the 'Forest Canopy' accent color against an 'Earthy Mist' background.
